name: Steffen Rothkugel
content: Steffen ROTHKUGEL - FSTM - University of Luxembourg I Uni.lu Associate professor Contact steffen.rothkugel@uni.lu (+352) 46 66 44 5259 Details Profile Profile CV Functions Associate professor In detail Faculty of Science, Technology and Medicine Department of Computer Science System Software | Distributed Systems | Mobile Computing Maison du Nombre6, avenue de la FonteL-4364 ESCH MNO, E03 0345010 steffen.rothkugel@uni.lu (+352) 46 66 44 5259 Publications on ORBilu Interactive distributed systems Document engineering Associate Professor at UL since 2002 Ph.D. in Computer Science from University of Trier in 2001 Diploma in Computer Science from University of Kaiserslautern in 1996 System software Distributed systems Mobile and ubiquitous computing Stay connected and subscribe to our newsletter All fields are mandatory Choose among our mailing list(s) Mailing list 0 items selected University of Luxembourg – News and events FSTM – News and events Enter your email address Example: contact@uni.lu Please provide a valid email address.
